title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API; pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface), model manager, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub-Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + ChromaDB + LangChain to chat with your documents offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to query Ollama models from within the editor; code explanation, generation, refactoring.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into Slack channels via slash commands or app mentions.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Unofficial Dart client for Ollama; usable in Flutter apps to run LLMs locally on desktop/mobile.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client library for Ollama; small surface, context cancellation, streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API with Tokio and serde.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama; includes session memory and model selector.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes or selections via Ollama.

title: ollama-models registry
summary: Community-curated registry of GGUF models ready to pull with Ollama; includes quantized variants.
